Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19073606]HIV-1WT:inhibition of virus replication in HeLa cells(EC50=362Â± 114 nM);HIV-1V38A:inhibition of virus replication in HeLa cells(EC50>1000 nM);HIV-1N43D:inhibition of virus replication in HeLa cells(EC50>1000 nM);HIV-1N43D/S138A:inhibition of virus replication in HeLa cells(EC50>1000 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide prevents interactions between the C-HR and the N-terminal HR (N-HR) of gp41, thus interfering with conformational changes that are required for viral fusion.

Literature.Title: Design of peptide-based inhibitors for human immunodeficiency virus type 1 strains resistant to T-20.
Literature.Author: Izumi K, Kodama E, Shimura K, Sakagami Y, Watanabe K, Ito S, Watabe T, Terakawa Y, Nishikawa H, Sarafianos SG, Kitaura K, Oishi S, Fujii N, Matsuoka M.
